manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
- Restored the old stories opening animation.  
- Restored the pencil icon for customizable notes.  
- Reintroduced the new vinyl design.  
- Re-enabled Reels watch and comment.  
- Enabled the new comment composer design.  
- Added blur effect while sharing mentioned stories.  
- Enabled the bottom toolbar in the Direct media editor.  
- Added AI Restyle button in the Direct media viewer.  
- Introduced option to pin self comments.  
- Added voice message button in the sharesheet composer (not functional yet).  
- Improved haptic feedback.  
- Fixed video playback issues.  
- Resolved stories 2x speed bug.  
- Fixed header glitch when opening stories.  
- Removed loading effect while sharing to Direct.  
- Cleaned up unwanted elements in Reels captions.  
- Fixed unexpected behaviour of Explore posts.  
- Partially fixed reactions bug in DMs.  
- Fixed minor bugs.  
- Updated old flags.  
- Overall improvements and optimizations.
manifest.name: Zain's Backup
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
